meanings.sent1: The rope was fibrous, made up of many thin strands.
meanings.sent2: The fibrous plant material was used to make strong baskets.
meanings.sent3: The fibrous texture of the fabric made it perfect for scrubbing dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a fibrous waterfall, cascading down her back.
meanings.sent5: The fibrous roots of the tree spread far and wide, anchoring it securely in the ground.

meanings.sent1: The fibrous tissue in the steak made it tough to chew.
meanings.sent2: The fibrous strands in the fruit added a crunchy texture.
meanings.sent3: The fibrous nature of the carpet made it a challenge to vacuum.
meanings.sent4: The fibrous connection between them was unbreakable, like a bond of steel.
meanings.sent5: The fibrous structure of the plant provided support and strength against the wind.
